DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Non-Reason Code ISO21090.DSET.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the motivation, cause or rationale that is explicitly NOT why an activity occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Non-Reason Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A coded value specifying the motivation, cause or rationale that is explicitly NOT why an activity occurred.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the motivation, cause or rationale that is explicitly NOT why an activity occurred.

Concepts.definition: A coded value specifying that an expected reason for something occurring was not the motivation, cause or rationale in this particular case.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A collection containing unordered distinct/discrete values of the type CD.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

AlternateNames.name: CDE 2750712:Therapies.Did a particular reason for the non-myeloablative / reduced intensity preparative regimen occur?
